mapper.update: UPDATE chat SET read_check = 1 WHERE cust_id=#{custId} AND stu_id=#{stuId} AND sender=#{sender} AND read_check=0;
mapper.select: SELECT chat_id, cust_id, stu_id, word, file_path, DATE_FORMAT(date_time, "%Y/%c/%e %r") date_time, sender, read_check FROM chat WHERE cust_id=#{custId} AND stu_id=#{stuId} AND sender=#{sender} AND read_check=0;

SELECT s.com_id comId, c.stuId, c.custId, count, DATE_FORMAT(c.dateTime, "%Y/%c/%e %r") dateTime FROM (SELECT stu_id stuId, cust_id custId, COUNT(chat_id) count, MAX(date_time) dateTime FROM chat WHERE sender=0 AND read_check = 0 GROUP BY cust_id, stu_id) c, (SELECT * FROM studio) s WHERE c.stuId = s.stu_id AND s.com_id=#{comId} ORDER BY dateTime DESC;

SELECT c.stuId, c.custId, count, DATE_FORMAT(c.dateTime, "%Y/%c/%e %r") dateTime FROM (SELECT stu_id stuId, cust_id custId, COUNT(chat_id) count, MAX(date_time) dateTime FROM chat WHERE sender = 1 AND read_check = 0 GROUP BY cust_id, stu_id) c, (SELECT * FROM customer) cu WHERE c.custId = cu.cust_id AND cu.cust_id = #{custId} ORDER BY dateTime DESC;
SELECT chat_id, cust_id, stu_id, word, file_path, DATE_FORMAT(date_time, "%Y/%c/%e %r") date_time, sender, read_check FROM chat WHERE chat_id=#{chatId};
SELECT chat_id, cust_id, stu_id, word, file_path, DATE_FORMAT(date_time, "%Y/%c/%e %r") date_time, sender, read_check FROM chat WHERE cust_id=#{custId} AND stu_id=#{stuId};

SELECT s.chat_id, s.cust_id, s.stu_id, s.word, s.file_path, DATE_FORMAT(s.date_time, "%Y/%c/%e %r") date_time, s.sender, s.read_check FROM (SELECT * FROM chat WHERE cust_id=#{custId} AND stu_id=#{stuId} ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 1) s;

SELECT comId, comName, comLogo, cs.stuId, stuName, custId, custName, custLogo, chatId, word, filePath, DATE_FORMAT(dateTime, "%Y/%c/%e %r") dateTime, sender, readCheck FROM (SELECT c.com_id comId, c.name comName, c.logo_img comLogo, s.stu_id stuId, s.name stuName FROM company c, studio s WHERE c.com_id=#{comId} AND c.com_id = s.com_id) cs, (SELECT cu.cust_id custId, cu.nickname custName, cu.img_src custLogo, ch.chat_id chatId, ch.stu_id stuId, ch.word word, ch.file_path filePath, ch.date_time dateTime, ch.sender sender, ch.read_check readCheck FROM (SELECT * FROM customer) cu, (SELECT * FROM chat WHERE date_time IN (SELECT MAX(date_time) FROM chat GROUP BY cust_id, stu_id)) ch WHERE cu.cust_id=ch.cust_id) cuh WHERE cs.stuId = cuh.stuId ORDER BY cuh.dateTime DESC;
